name: Deathlock Wight
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.Sunlight Sensitivity: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.Multiattack: The wight attacks twice with Grave Bolt.
actions.Grave Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) necrotic damage.
actions.Life Drain: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
